Bank.English: A bank is a financial institution that accepts deposits from the public and creates a demand deposit while simultaneously making loans.

bullish.English: Market sentiment, also known as investor attention, is the general prevailing attitude of investors as to anticipated price development in a market.

Here.English: An ice age is a long period of reduction in the temperature of Earth's surface and atmosphere, resulting in the presence or expansion of continental and polar ice sheets and alpine glaciers.

Wall Street.English: Wall Street is an eight-block-long street in the Financial District of Lower Manhattan in New York City.

https.English: Hypertext Transfer Protocol Secure (HTTPS) is an extension of the Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP).

t.co.English: Twitter is a microblogging, social networking service owned by American company Twitter, Inc., on which users post and interact with messages known as "tweets".
